content: Apple Inc  suppliers Cirrus Logic Inc  and Qorvo Inc  on Thursday added to growing worries about slowing shipments of iPhone 6S and 6S Plus by cutting their revenue estimates for the third quarter.
name: Qorvo Inc
title: Apple suppliers cut revenue estimates amid iPhone shipment fears

content: Jan 7 Apple Inc suppliers Cirrus Logic Inc and Qorvo Inc estimated third-quarter revenue below analysts' expectations  exacerbating fears about softening iPhone demand.
name: Qorvo Inc
title: CORRECTED-Apple suppliers Cirrus Logic  Qorvo estimate revenue below Street

content: Jan 5 Apple Inc is expected to cut production of its latest iPhone models by about 30 percent in the January-March quarter  the Nikkei reported.
name: Qorvo Inc
title: UPDATE 2-Apple expected to cut iPhone 6S  6S Plus production - Nikkei
